title: sharIrakke barudide
sahitya:
shiva darushana namagAidu kELE shivarAtriya jAgaraNe


anupallavi

  pAtALa gangeya snAnava mADalu pAtakavella parihAravu 
jyOti lingana dhyAnava mADalu dyUtagaLilla anudinavu


caraNam    bEDida varagaLa koDuvanu tAyi brhmaNa rANiya nODuvanu Aduta pADuta vELaya pasavana 
Anandadali nalidADuvanu cigaravu kaNDenu purandara viTTalana hari nArAyaNa dhyAnadali
